statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); username=$(whoami); hostname=$(hostname -s); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then status=$(git -C "$cwd" status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); ind=""; echo "$status" | grep -q "^??" && ind="${ind}?"; echo "$status" | grep -q "^ M\|^M " && ind="${ind}✱"; echo "$status" | grep -q "^A " && ind="${ind}✚"; echo "$status" | grep -q "^D \| D" && ind="${ind}✖"; git_info=" :${branch}${ind}"; fi; fi; node_info=""; if command -v node > /dev/null 2>&1; then nv=$(node -v 2>/dev/null | sed 's/v//'); [ -n "$nv" ] && node_info=" node:${nv}"; fi; printf "\033[32m[\033[33m%s\033[32m@\033[34m%s\033[32m: \033[31m%s\033[0m\033[32m%s\033[32m]\033[36m%s\033[0m" "$username" "$hostname" "$cwd" "$git_info" "$node_info"
